details.title: Dirichlet-neumann problem for unipolar isentropic quantum drift-diffusion model
details.abstract: This paper studies the existence, semiclassical limit, and long-time behavior of weak solutions to the unipolar isentropic quantum drift-diffusion model, a fourth order parabolic system. Semi-discretization in time and entropy estimates give the global existence and semiclassical limit of nonnegative weak solutions to the one-dimensional model with a nonnegative large initial value and a Dirichlet-Neumann boundary condition. Furthermore, the weak solutions are proven to exponentially approach constant steady state as time increases to infinity.
